TextBlock.Text: NYLOX: So this is the place where it all happened.
NYLOX: Must've been both scary and mesmorizing to watch it shatter into pieces.
NYLOX: Just standing here on the edge is terrifying... seeing all the gas looming below me.
NYLOX: But I guess that what makes it beautiful.
NYLOX: Oh! Right! Stupid me, I have to place the thingy for the <color=orange>Outer Space Station</color>!
